name: Mr. Strawman
description:
Hello!

Made this game in 48 hours for the ScoreJam23, Hope you enjoy it and please leave a review!

Description: You've spent your whole life on a farm doing all the chores except collecting hay from the corn field. But today your father has asked you to do this chore due to him spraining his ankle.
Listening to your father, he tells you that you need to go into the corn field:

  1. Collect the hay and be careful of the scarecrow guarding the crops!
  2. Return hay bag back to the truck!
  3. Collect as many hay bags as you can!

Controls:

W, A, S, D to move around.
Use your mouse to look around and mouse button to interact.

Additional sound effects from https://www.zapsplat.com
